prompt:
We introduce CLASS TLDR NOTES generation, a new form of extreme summarization of very error-prone transcripts for a student who isn't listening. CLASS TLDR NOTES generation involves high source compression, removes stop words and summarizes the very error-prone transcript whilst retaining meaning and insight. The result is the shortest possible note that retains all of the original meaning and context of the error-prone transcript. The speaker is a teacher.

Example

Paragraph:

[TRANSCRIPT]

 CLASS TLDR NOTES:
